# anchorOffset

**Instance Property**

An offset that changes the annotation’s default anchor point.

## Declaration

```swift
get anchorOffset(): DOMPoint;
```

## Discussion

You can’t change the anchor offset for a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PlaceAnnotation].
title: anchorOffset
